data.title: Major League Soccer Official Colors (1996-present)
data.meta_description: A historical record of official team colors for professional soccer clubs in Major League Soccer (1996-present).
data.text:
HomeProjectMajor League Soccer Official Colors (1996 through present)

Major League Soccer Official Colors (1996 through present)

A historical record of official team colors for all professional soccer clubs in Major League Soccer (1996-present). All Hex/HTML, RGB and CMYK color code information is representative of current PANTONE® color publications on coated paper stock and within the sRGB color space unless specifically noted. Estimated colors are indicated with asterisks (*).

Back to Soccer/Association Football.

As well as being the founder of TruColor (formerly ColorWerx and The Society for Sports Uniforms Research), I am also a database developer and run a software development and consulting business with my wife Amy. The company is called Ethx. I have been interested in logos and uniforms since the early '70s, and am especially interested in team colors, including color science. I have also been a professional musician for 40+ years as well, and received a Bachelor's degree in Music (jazz studies - performance and arranging emphasis) from North Texas State University (now the University of North Texas) in 1985.
